title: [Vornavis, Wooded Plains]
description: Logs have been cut and laid across the path here to provide footing as the path climbs very steeply to the north.  To the south, a dim light can be seen, the moonlight giving hope for an eventual way out of the black woods.  All sounds fall away, making the echoes of boots on logs seem deafening.

Logs have been cut and laid across the path here to provide footing as the path climbs very steeply to the north.  To the south, a dim light can be seen, the sunlight giving hope for an eventual way out of the black woods.  All sounds fall away, making the echoes of boots on logs seem deafening.
